title: Flight attedant Mark facial feedback hypothesis

content.question: Mark, a flight attendant, began his workday in a bad mood. However, by the end of the day, he felt much happier. According to the facial feedback hypothesis, what may have influenced Markâ€™s mood?

choices.label: The flight was so full that Mark did not have time to reflect on events that were troubling him.
Because it is his job to be courteous to customers, Mark smiled at passengers frequently.
Mark helped several passengers who then told his supervisor how nice he was.
Mark is good friends with some of the other flight attendants, and they cheered him up during the flight.

content.answer: Because it is his job to be courteous to customers, Mark smiled at passengers frequently.
